data.actual_result: Nothing happens, the box is not shown. (Asked to a Developer and this is a bug rather than a missing feature)
data.expected_result: It shows its box, as it does for the Cancel button and the other buttons on Discord.
data.short_description: The Reset Nickname button in the Change Nickname screen doesn't show its box when holding.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a Server where you can change your nickname. - Click on the three dots and then Change Nickname. - Hold on "Reset Nickname" and observe.
